import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PostService from '../PostService'; import {Card,Nav,Navbar} from 'react-bootstrap' const postService = new PostService(); class PostList extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { posts: [], }; } componentDidMount() { var self = this; const postService = new PostService(); postService.getPosts().then(function (result) { console.log(result); self.setState({ posts: result.data}) }); } render() { return ( Home
Docs Upload


{/*
Home
Docs(current) Upload
All Videos Images Docs
{this.state.posts.map( c =>

{c.Name}

{c.Description.substring(0,10) + "..."}

Posted by { " " + c.Author + " " } on {" " + c.Init_time.substring(0,10)}

)};
*/}

); } } export default PostList;
